string.value: I should go and meet with Kidd. His royal highness is asking for me so...
You're telling me he's the Ruling King of the Seagulls? Why would the King of the Seagulls be looking for me? Well, let me go see him and find out.
Jonathan... The King of the Seagulls. Well he certainly has a presence about him.

Hey, long time! I've been frantically looking for you, since Lord Jonathan really wanted to see you. Good thing you walked past me! Awesome. Lord Jonathan has been really wanting to see you since you became a Corsair. Are you interested in meeting with him?

That's great. Who's Lord Jonathan, you ask? He's the one that has been a pillar of strength for us Pirates. Pirates and seagulls have this special relationship, where we help each other out in numerous ways. Our friendship goes back ages. Currently, Lord Jonathan serves as the king to the seagulls. Now, I heard that Lord Jonathan has stopped by The Nautilus and is inside. You should go in there and look for him.
Are you not eager to meet Lord Jonathan because you don't know who he is? Hmm... I think it'll be best for you if you pay a visit...

Ohhhh! Now that was impressive! I considered my test quite difficult, and for you to pass that... you are indeed an integral member of the Pirate family, and a friend of seagulls. We are now bonded by the mutual friendship that will last a lifetime! And, most of all, friends are there to help you out when you are in dire straits. If you are in a state of emergency, call us seagulls.
Notify us using the skill Air Strike, and we will be there to help you out, because that's what friends are for.
Lord Jonathan should be somewhere in The Nautilus. He loves moving to different places that it's not easy to keep track of him.
You'll have to answer all the questions I give you.
